imdb.title: Danshi kôkôsei no nichijô
imdb.plot: A sketch comedy about three friends attending an all boys school.

episodes.title: High School Boys and After School
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys role play how to get a girlfriend, wear their sister's clothes, tell scary stories, block another boy's relationship with a girl, and act cool down by the river.

episodes.title: High School Boys and the Morning Journey
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys LARP on the way home from school, work at a pizza place, prove their friendship and camaraderie, mistake people for someone else, talk to their principal, relive their childhood, and tell more scary stories.

episodes.title: High School Boys and Summer Plans
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys make plans for summer, go to the beach, play table tennis, pretend to host a radio talk show, create great summer memories, and become obsessed with a girl.

episodes.title: High School Boys and Eavesdropping
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys eavesdrop on their friends, plan and execute a school festival, and get advice from a girl.

episodes.title: High School Boys and Dubbing
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys dub girls on the street, get picked on by older girls, pretend to get beaten up, catch up with old friends, remember childhood memories, and try to act cool.

episodes.title: High School Boys and the Holy Night
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys get chased by their friend's sister, hang out on the first day of a new term, secretly back up a friend's sister, console a girl, look for lost puppies, and try out their new super moves.

episodes.title: High School Boys and Gags
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys entertain each other with gags, LARP at home, try to ignore the girl who is embarrassing herself, take a questionnaire, and talk about how dumb their friend is.

episodes.title: High School Boys and Motoharu's Older Sister
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys converse with their sister, console their friend, critique their friend's fan comic, talk to the girl across the balcony, go to the convenience store, help a girl, eat cake, discuss horoscopes, and deal with bugs.

episodes.title: High School Boys and Older Brothers and Sisters
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys deal with their sibling dating their friend's sibling, visit their grandmother, break a younger girl's heart, lose their glasses, solve issues with the student council, prove points, and atone for misdeeds.

episodes.title: High School Boys and Limits
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys hold it for as long as possible, have a bad day, prepare for winter, run from a girl, choke on food, slip on the pavement, ride a bicycle, cook for their sister, and hang out at school.

episodes.title: High School Boys and Fathers
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys bond with their father, get caught in an awkward situation, compete with each other, ruin their friend's stuff, engage in small talk, get a love letter, get their souls crushed by a girl, and get annoyed.

episodes.title: High School Girls are Funky - Demons
episodes.plot: In this episode, see high school boys lie, play a crane game, get help from a store clerk, comment on the relationships of others, save a girl from the advances of strangers, enjoy a hot dog, and graduate from high school.
